sentence.Network_en: An appeaser is one who feeds a crocodile -- hoping it will eat him last.
sentence.Network_cn: 绥靖者是纵恶的喂鳄鱼的人 —— 希望鳄鱼最后一个吃他.

entry.def: If you try to appease someone, you try to stop them from being angry by giving them what they want.

example.ex: Gandhi was accused by some of trying to appease both factions of the electorate...
example.tran: 一些人指责甘地试图安抚两派选民。

example.ex: The offer has not appeased separatists.
example.tran: 该提议未能平抚分裂分子。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who tries to bring peace by acceding to demands;

sentences.sentence: "An appeaser is one who feeds a crocodile--hoping it will eat him last"--Winston Churchill

auth_sentence.content: Winston Churchill's old adage about the crocodile and the appeaser comes to mind.
